title: Adding a 5 tier unit at the start of the game to help players from going the same comp every game
body:
Each player is given a tier 5 unit at the very beginning (not deployable until level 5 or something) and is guaranteed to have a much higher chance of getting that tier 5 unit.

This will make strategizing more interesting and slightly remove some of the RNG in terms of final comp since the player must play whatever he can get in original RNG, and want to converge towards the given tier 5 after level 7.

This can also help to not have everyone going for the same comp every game.

replies.body:
Makes too much of a rush for levels because of the strength of a free r5. Also creates too much of a potential free win for comps like nobles, where they rely on specifically getting Kayle to win.

Also fucks over whatever poor guy gets handed Miss Fortune or whatever other mediocre rank 5(s) there are in s10.

It's...an idea. And comes from a decent place. But the drawbacks are a bit much.
Maybe it becomes available after a certain round, rather than level?

If the game makes these adjustments then it should be more straight forward on how the tier 5s can be balanced as well. There is still a comp differential but I am hoping the game moves towards a holy-trinity style in the sense that comps are somewhat of a counter to each other instead of just having one be stronger. And comps being countered can relieve the counter by mixing up the comp with another synergy. I think this part is really missing in the game.
